text:
Champions League
Valence - Lille: "The addition is very heavy"
After leading 1-0 against Valencia, Lille collapsed completely and finally lost 4-1. Discover the very bitter reaction of Christophe Galtier.
05 Nov 2019, 22:32 by Antoine Chirat



During this 4th day of the Champions League, the Dogues were moving to Valencia in. Discover the editorial notes attributed to Lille! Icon Sport



Mike Maignan (6) Lille could have kept their 3 valuable points against Valencia, largely thanks to their tricolor goalkeeper. However, he conceded 3 goals in the second half against the passivity of his defense.



Gabriel (4) Like his defense partners Lille, the Brazilian defender was put to the test but was a bit stronger than the othersIcon Sport



Jos√© Fonte (4) The 2016 European Champion has not been as calm as most of his defense partners. In difficulty on the attacks of Valencia, he caused the penalty of the equalizerIcon Sport



Adama Soumaoro (4) The defenseman trained in the Dogues also suffered a lot against the counter of the Naranjas and is at the origin of the most dangerous actions of his opponents and in particular on the second goal conceded by his teamIcon Sport



Zeki Celik (3.5) The Turkish international has often been taken aback and passive during the big return of the Spanish club. He is behind the second goal conceded.Icon Sport



Domagoj Bradaric (4,5) Croatian was often pushed around the middle of the field and moreover when Valencia Valencia return.Icon Sport



Boubakary Soumare (4.5) Just like his team, the young Lille midfielder cracked in the second half under the pressure of the Spanish club, sometimes losing too many balloonsIcon Sport



Benjamin Andr√© (6) The former midfielder was precious in the recovery distilling good balls for his partners during Lille assault on the cage of the Dogues.Icon Sport



Lo√Øc R√©my (4.5) The former Olympique de Marseille striker was less successful than his Nigerian team-mate on the front of the attack despite a big opportunity in the first half. He will have spared no effort to defendIcon Sport



Yusuf Yazici (4,5) Very early in the game, the most expensive rookie in the history of LOSC died out during the match, as the halted phases less and less well drawn.Icon Sport



Victor Osimhen (6) Very available and generous in the effort to the image of his 2nd goal in 4 matches of C1, the Nigerian striker could have even afforded an assist on the occasion of Yusuf Yazici (54th) . He was less decisive in the second half, often lonelyIcon Sport

Valence - Lille: the notes of Lille!




Bitter. Christophe Galtier was very lucid in a press conference even if the coach of the Dogues had trouble hiding his disappointment. Indeed, having been in the lead for much of the game, the Lille have finally exploded against Valencia on the score of 4-1. "The addition is very heavy, until the 81st we were 1-1, we had to take some risks on the game plan." There are the guiding ideas and what we do in the field. showed interesting things, but it was not enough. " explained the former coach of ASSE. Lille is almost eliminated from all European competitions.







The last 5 results of the LOSC




Christophe Galtier + 12 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Ligue 1: OM 2-1 Lille
Ligue 1: Bordeaux 0-3 Lille
